## Problem 1
First download a package containing the `penguins` dataset.

``` {r message=FALSE}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
```

Next, load the `penguins` dataset:

``` {r message=FALSE}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

``` {r}
names(penguins)
colnames(penguins)
```
